original_text: And they told him, and said, We came unto the land whither thou sentest us, and surely it floweth with milk and honey; and this is the fruit of it.
korean_text: 모세에게 말하여 이르되 당신이 우리를 보낸 땅에 간즉 과연 그 땅에 젖과 꿀이 흐르는데 이것은 그 땅의 과일이니이다

sentences.original_text: And they told him, and said,
and surely it floweth with milk and honey;
sentences.korean_translation: 과연 그 땅은 젖과 꿀이 흐르나이다

sentences.original_text: and this is the fruit of it.
